value.description: the value displayed in the element

label.description: the text displayed aside the textfield

hintText.description: the text displayed inside the textfield

description.description: the text displayed under the textfield

obscure.description: Whether the input text should be hidden or not

disabled.description: Whether the input should be disabled or not

inRow.description: Whether the input and label should be in row or not

error.description: Whether the textfield should show and error or not

errorMessage.description: The error message to display whenever the input is incorrect
